author: chirino
msg: Fixes APLO-76: It would be nice to be able to configure Apollo's behavior when a queue is full.  You can now block, or drop from the tail or head of the queue.

author: chirino
msg: Fixes APLO-16 : Add support for Dead Letter Queues
